articles.title: Dyson's new hair dryer is a feat of engineering – but there's one annoying design feature you need to know about if you're thinking of buying one
articles.author: Ruth Hamilton
articles.summary: Dyson released the Supersonic r hair dryer, initially a professional-only tool, as a consumer version last month. This hair dryer features a light, streamlined design for precision styling. The plug contains mechanics moved from the main body, making it exceptionally large.

articles.title: The Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge might look gorgeous, but its headline feature stands out for all the wrong reasons
articles.author: Zachariah Kelly
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a thin phone priced at $1,099.99 / £1,099 / AU$1,849. It shares many specs with the Galaxy S25 Plus (starting at $999 / £999 / AU$1,699) but sacrifices battery and camera quality for its thin design.

articles.title: Inside China's Controversial Factories: The Rise of Hyper-Realistic Sex Dolls, Including Child-Sized Models, Making Their Way to the U.S.
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: WMDoll is integrating generative AI tools like ChatGPT into its sex dolls to make them more responsive and interactive, offering users a better experience with about eight different 'personalities'. Shenzhen Atall Intelligent Robot Technology also produces custom-made AI sex robots, with features like moving eyes, lips, and head, along with English and Chinese language capabilities.

articles.title: I replaced my iPhone with a premium dumbphone - here's my verdict after a month
articles.author: Kyle Kucharski
articles.summary: Light Phone is launching the Light Phone 3, a simplified phone with a sleek design and a focused purpose. The phone features a USB-C port, buttons, and a matte display. It is available for pre-order for $699 and is supported by major carriers.

articles.title: Pokémon Legends: Arceus Release Date Announced
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Game Freak will launch Pokemon Legends: Z-A on October 16, 2025, for both Nintendo Switch and the upcoming Nintendo Switch 2. The new installment features Mega Evolutions, a dynamic combat system, and a reimagined Lumiose City. Pre-orders begin on June 5 via the Nintendo eShop.

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney Sells Soap Containing Her Bath Water
articles.summary: Dr. Squatch, in collaboration with Sydney Sweeney, launched a new limited-edition soap called 'Sydney's Bathwater Bliss'. This soap is promoted as being infused with Sweeney's actual bathwater, and the scent is named 'Morning Wood'.

articles.title: 52 Of The Best Father's Day Gifts To Give In 2025
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: The article highlights a range of new and innovative products ideal as Father's Day gifts. These include items like the Fellow Aiden Precision Drip Coffee Maker, the G-Shock watch, and the Nintendo Switch OLED, catering to diverse interests such as coffee brewing, durable timepieces, and gaming. The products represent new offerings or recent updates aimed at enhancing user experience and convenience.

articles.title: vivo Y29 launches with 6500mAh BlueVolt battery at Php 8,999
articles.author: Inquirer.Net Brandroom
articles.summary: vivo launched the vivo Y29 smartphone, available from Php 8,999. The Y29 features a 6500mAh BlueVolt battery, military-grade durability, and a 120Hz refresh rate display. It is available in two variants and can be purchased at vivo concept stores and kiosks nationwide and online.

articles.title: 36 Things To Buy If You're Tired Of Being An Adult
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: The article presents a range of new household products designed to solve common problems and improve convenience. These include a Windex outdoor glass cleaner for hard-to-reach windows, a Pikk-it tool for removing hair from vacuums, and a self-closing toothpaste cap to prevent messes.

articles.title: 'I've used this Shark Mop for 6 months - my floors have never look cleaner'
articles.author: Harriet Morphy-Morris
articles.summary: Shark is offering its Kick n' Flip Automatic Steam Mop for \u00a399, a cheaper alternative to Dyson's washG1. The Shark mop uses steam instead of soapy water and features a 'kick n' flip' function for concentrated steam blasts to remove stubborn stains.

articles.title: Dispenser that gives draft quality beer at home is perfect for Father's Day
articles.author: Seán Crosbie
articles.summary: Amazon promotes the 'Draft Wizard Ultrasonic Frothing Beer Dispenser' as a Father's Day gift. The product dispenses beer with a pull of the handle and offers an option for more head.

articles.title: Aldi Plans to Open More Than 30 New Stores Across 12 States, and Shoppers Are So Excited
articles.author: Nina Derwin
articles.summary: Aldi announced plans to open 33 new stores across 12 states. Aldi also plans to open 225 new stores by the end of the year and aims to reach 800 stores by 2028. Aldi already holds the title of the third-largest grocery chain in the country with more than 2,400 stores nationwide.

articles.title: 'If you've ever dreamed of joining this iconic brand, now's your chance': Victoria's Secret prepares to open its first standalone store in Northern Ireland and is currently hiring
articles.author: Claire Cartmill
articles.summary: Victoria's Secret is opening its first standalone store in Northern Ireland, located in Belfast city centre on Donegall Place. The store's launch this summer will introduce the brand's lingerie and lifestyle products to Northern Irish shoppers. Recruitment is underway for various roles, offering staff discounts and wellbeing services.

articles.title: You've Probably Been Eyeing These 40 Wildly Popular Products For A While, And I'm Here To Tell You They're Worth It
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Gold Bond launched a firming neck and chest cream. Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder. NeeDoh released "Dream Drop" sensory fidget toy. Clinique launched Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in Black Honey. Catrice released "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener. Good Molecules launched Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel and Pineapple Exfoliating Powder. E.l.f launched Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara. Lumify released Eye Drops. The Pink Stuff launched new "Sqeezy" sponge set. Mielle launched Rosemary Mint strengthening oil. Mario Badescu launched Drying Lotion. Touchland launched Power Mist hydrating hand sanitizer. Biodance launched Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask. Death Wish launched Instant Coffee Packets.

articles.title: Inside China's disturbing sex doll factories building thousands of hyper-realistic robots – including child-sized dolls which are flooding America
articles.summary: WMDoll is incorporating generative AI tools like ChatGPT into its sex dolls to enhance their interactivity, offering users a more engaging experience with customizable personalities. Shenzhen Atall Intelligent Robot Technology also offers custom-made AI dolls to clients from Europe and the US. These dolls feature advanced capabilities such as responding to users verbally and simulating human-like characteristics.

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney Sells Soap Containing Her Bath Water
articles.author: Alana Mastrangelo
articles.summary: Dr. Squatch, in collaboration with Sydney Sweeney, launched a limited-edition soap called 'Sydney's Bathwater Bliss' infused with Sweeney's actual bathwater. The soap company also announced a giveaway of 100 soap bars. The limited stock of 'Sydney's Bathwater Bliss' bars are not available yet, and the company will announce when they drop.

articles.title: Run AI Models Locally with Google's New App
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Google launched the 'AI Edge Gallery', an Android application that allows users to run AI models directly on their smartphones without an internet connection. The app, available as an experimental alpha release on Github, supports a range of AI models for tasks like image generation, question answering, code writing, and text summarization. An iOS version is expected to be released soon.

articles.title: Amazon Slashes Price On Its Kindle Colorsoft Just In Time For Father's Day
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of the Kindle, its premier e-reader device. This price reduction might encourage existing customers to upgrade to a newer model.

articles.title: Here's where to get the best deal on the viral Ninja Creami ice cream maker
articles.author: Rachel Morrison
articles.summary: The Ninja Creami is a kitchen appliance that turns almost anything into a frozen dessert with settings for ice cream, sorbet, and milkshakes. It is currently on sale at Walmart for $169, about $30 off its original price.

articles.title: The 41 Best Father's Day Gifts for the Dad Who Has Everything
articles.author: Nicole Hoey
articles.summary: Philips introduced the i9000 Prestige Ultra Shaver, featuring five shaving modes and SenseIQ Pro AI tech for personalized shaving feedback. Sonos debuted the Ace headphones, boasting active noise cancellation, spatial audio, and a 30-hour battery life. Parfums de Marly launched Castley, a new fragrance featuring crisp citrus notes balanced with peppery, woody undertones.

articles.title: USPS lowers overnight shipping prices to take down Fedex, UPS
articles.author: Dana Sullivan Kilroy
articles.summary: USPS has launched Priority Mail Next Day, a new service for online retailers and small businesses, guaranteeing next-day delivery. Available by contract in 62 U.S. markets initially, this service aims to compete with FedEx and UPS by offering a simpler, cost-effective overnight shipping solution without complex fees.

articles.title: Meet NEO, your robot butler in training
articles.author: Robert Lee
articles.summary: NEO is a new robot helper designed to vacuum, water plants, and provide companionship. Børnich highlights the development of NEO and its vision for robots freeing up users' time for other activities.

articles.title: I Don't Like AI, but I Still Use These 6 AI Features on My Phone
articles.author: Bertel King
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced new AI-powered features to enhance user experience on devices like the Galaxy Z Fold 6. These include handwriting conversion to text in Samsung Keyboard and Notes, improved voice-to-text functionality in Samsung's Voice Recorder, and an enhanced Object Eraser in Samsung Gallery for image editing. Additionally, Galaxy devices with S Pen support now offer AI Smart Select for easier screen content selection and manipulation, along with a handwriting straightening feature in Samsung Notes.

articles.title: Their View: Shopping with AI
articles.author: Staff Reports
articles.summary: OpenAI has announced shopping support on all ChatGPT plans, including the free plan. To avoid sponsored results, users should turn off web browsing, as ChatGPT may draw results from Bing, which accepts sponsored results.

articles.title: 5 reasons why I'm only buying SSDs and not HDDs
articles.author: Ben Smith
articles.summary: The article highlights the Samsung 990 EVO SSD as a high-powered solution for speedy storage, costing around $70 for a single TB. The T5 EVO SSD is also mentioned for its blazing-fast speeds and impressive storage capacity, making it suitable for workflows.

articles.title: Airbnb to offer thousands of services
articles.summary: Airbnb is expanding its services beyond lodging. The company plans to offer new services such as hair styling, cooking, massage, and photography.

articles.title: Using Chatbots for Customer Service
articles.author: Blaine Howerton
articles.summary: Several companies offer chatbot services, including Tidio, Drift, Intercom, ManyChat, and Chatfuel. These chatbots provide instant responses to customer inquiries, handle routine tasks, and free up human agents. Integrating chatbots with CRM or helpdesk systems like HubSpot, Salesforce, or Zendesk can further streamline customer service.

articles.title: AZAH's Latest summer Collection Now at Packages Mall
articles.author: Ahmed Khan
articles.summary: AZAH launched the Summer Dream Collection 2025, a new line of kidswear inspired by tropical and boho themes. The brand has also introduced a new line for adults and plans to expand globally.

articles.title: 51 Products You Won't Just "Normal" Like, You'll *Reallllllllyyyy* Like
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Sol de Janeiro introduced Brazilian Bum Bum Cream which contains cupuaçu butter, coconut oil, and açai oil for hydration. Also Java Sock introduced a new product to keep iced coffee cold and prevent sweating. Moreover SweatBlock antiperspirant wipes with clinical strength were introduced which lasts upto seven days.

articles.title: Ninja 'non-stick' pan drops to £19 in Amazon sale as shoppers buy more in the range
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: Ninja is offering the ZEROSTICK Essentials Cookware 20cm Frying Pan, noted for its non-stick properties and durability. Currently, Amazon has the pan available at a promotional price of £18.49, reduced from its normal retail price of £30. The pan is compatible with ceramic and induction hobs, is oven-safe up to 260 degrees, and allows cooking with little to no oil.

articles.title: Amazon has 100s of deals to shop this weekend — save up to 80% on tech, home, kitchen and more
articles.author: Melina Brum
articles.summary: Amazon is offering deals on various products, including the new Amazon Fire HD 8 Tablet, currently priced at $90 (originally $120). Other discounted products include the Google Nest Doorbell, Acer Aspire 3 Laptop, and several items from different companies in categories like headphones, kitchen appliances, and beauty products.

articles.title: Amazon Kindle Paperwhite 2025: The library in your hand
articles.author: Nandagopal Rajan
articles.summary: Amazon has introduced the new Kindle Paperwhite with a thinner design and easier setup using the Kindle app. It features improved reading experience with faster page flips and adjustable warm lighting. Additionally, users can now directly purchase books using Amazon UPI.

articles.title: Microsoft Notepad Gets Major Update on Windows 11: Could It Replace MS Word?
articles.author: Monitor News Desk
articles.summary: Microsoft has launched a major update to its Notepad app in Windows 11, introducing text formatting features such as bold and italics. This update enhances the structure and readability of notes by enabling users to create lists, add headings, and insert hyperlinks.

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney spotted in bathrobe day after launching bathwater soap
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Sydney Sweeney, in collaboration with Dr. Squatch, launched a new, limited-edition soap called "Sydney's Bathwater Bliss" made with her actual bathwater. The announcement on Instagram led to significant reactions from fans expressing disbelief and disgust. The product launch occurred after an ad campaign, referencing fans' inquiries about her bathwater.

articles.title: Amazon Is Selling a 'Highly Effective' $66 Bug Zapper for Just $30, and Shoppers Say It's 'a Game Changer'
articles.author: Cameron Le Blanc
articles.summary: The New Fi Bug Zapper, a new pest control solution, is available for \$30 at Amazon, a 55% discount. This bug zapper uses blue-violet and UV lights to attract mosquitoes, flies, and moths, utilizing a 4,200-volt electrical grid. It is waterproof, equipped with a hanging hook, and covers up to 2,100 square feet.

articles.title: Canada Dry Club Soda: Same-Day Delivery/Pickup
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Canada Dry Club Soda is now available for ultra-fast delivery through Woodman's Food Markets, offering delivery in as little as one hour and convenient curbside pickup. Consumers can now enjoy Canada Dry Club Soda quickly and easily without leaving their homes.

articles.title: 野村元農相、小泉氏に苦言　「自民部会諮らず発表」
articles.summary: NKN introduced a new P2P network connectivity protocol and ecosystem powered by a public blockchain. NKN incentivizes users to share network connections and bandwidth for a decentralized data transmission network. Use cases include nCDN, a new kind of Content Delivery Network for faster video streaming, and PubSub for chat/IM.

articles.title: Just 42 Summer Must-Haves That Reviewers Swear By
articles.author: Rachelle Yang
articles.summary: The article highlights various new products for summer use.  Items like Supergoop Unseen Sunscreen and La Roche-Posay sunscreen offer sun protection, while mosquito repellents and Burt's Bees After Sun soother address insect bites and sunburns. Additionally, cooling solutions like the BedJet system and HyperChiller are introduced for managing heat.

articles.title: Mists are having a moment! ROSIE GREENS's best sprays for summer, from an £11 skincare buy to an anti-frizz hair hero
articles.author: ROSIE GREEN
articles.summary: New multitasking sprays are emerging as alternatives to creams and oils, providing rejuvenation, hydration, tanning, and detangling benefits. Recent formulation innovations have expanded the functionality of mists beyond simple refreshment. Space NK has observed a 48% increase in face-mist sales, indicating growing consumer interest.

articles.title: How much does the Sydney Sweeney bathwater soap cost?
articles.author: Tiffanie Drayton
articles.summary: Sydney Sweeney and Dr. Squatch have launched a limited-edition soap called "Sydney Sweeney's Bathwater Bliss." The soap is infused with Sweeney's actual bathwater and will be available for purchase on June 6 at drsquatch.com. Only 5,000 bars will be produced, costing $8 each.

articles.title: 31 Beauty Products To Help You Create A Tip-Top Routine
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: Cosrx introduces a hydrating Snail Mucin Power Essence. OGX launches an Argan Oil of Morocco Curl-Defining Cream. Skin1004 releases pore tightening and lifting masks. CeraVe offers a non-comedogenic salicylic acid body wash and an eye cream. VieBeauti presents an eyelash growth serum. L'Oréal launches Wonder Water Lamellar Hair Treatment. Bio-Oil markets a multiuse skincare oil. Fanola releases "No Yellow" purple shampoo. Etude House launches SPF 50 sun milk. First Aid Beauty releases KP Bump Eraser Body Scrub Exfoliant. CeraVe markets a Retinol Serum.

articles.title: Scouted: John Legend's Skincare Brand Levels Up With New Unisex Product Drops
articles.summary: Loved01, founded by John Legend, has launched two new skincare products: Brightening Serum and Soothing Wipes. The Brightening Serum features a cooling steel rollerball and ingredients like niacinamide and mandelic acid to combat dullness and hyperpigmentation. The Soothing Wipes contain plant-based ingredients like blue tansy and licorice root for removing makeup and nourishing the skin.

articles.title: Why Is Orage Technologies Best Digital Marketing Services Company In 2
articles.summary: Orage Technologies offers a comprehensive suite of digital marketing services, including SEO, PPC advertising, social media marketing, content marketing, email marketing, and web development and design. They focus on data-driven strategies to optimize campaigns and improve ROI for their clients. Orage Technologies also utilizes AI and automation tools to scale results efficiently.

articles.title: I tried Simba's Hybrid Firm Pillow to see if it would banish my neck pain
articles.author: Samuel Jones
articles.summary: Simba introduced the Hybrid Firm Pillow, priced at £159, featuring adjustable firmness and Stratos cool-touch technology. The pillow includes Simba Renew down-like inner pillows and Aerocoil micro springs. Simba also offers a cheaper Hybrid pillow at £109.

articles.title: Fintech Experts Converge As Dyna.Ai Launches Operations
articles.author: Leadership News
articles.summary: Dyna.Ai has launched its operations in Nigeria, introducing its suite of AI-powered products and solutions to the financial ecosystem. The launch event showcased advanced AI technologies like Agent Studio, AvatarGPT, and VoiceGPT, featuring local accents for seamless communication.

articles.title: Skincare That Saves – Day Cream Offers at Myntra's End of Reason Sale
articles.summary: IDPL introduces several new skincare products, including a Brightening day cream with SPF 17, a Lightweight gel moisturizer with Vitamin C and SPF 30, a Light moisturising cream with SPF 15 and Vitamin E, a Lightweight, oil-free moisturizer with NMF Complex and Panthenol, and a Brightening face cream with SPF 15 and pure niacinamide.

articles.title: Increasing Global Concerns Over Microplastics Exposure
articles.author: Thisday
articles.summary: Ziplock is known for its smart plastic packaging bags and containers, designed with a smooth and effortless zip-up mechanism.

articles.title: Retail industry Archives
articles.summary: Dick's Sporting Goods' GameChanger app is revolutionizing youth sports. GameChanger is being used for live streaming games and managing team schedules.

articles.title: Lava Bold N1 Pro Sale To Begin on June 2, 2025, Smartphone Has IP54 Water and Dust Resistance Rating; Check Price, Other Specifications and Features Here
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Lava Mobiles launched the Lava Bold N1 Pro in India on May 29, 2025, featuring an IP54 rating, Unisoc T606 processor, 50MP camera, and a 5,000mAh battery, with a starting price of INR 6,999. The Lava Bold N1 Pro sale starts on June 2, 2025, and is available on AmazonIN at a special launch price of ₹6,699.

articles.title: #TECH: Flagship features in affordable package
articles.author: Izwan Ismail
articles.summary: Realme has introduced the GT 7 series, including the GT 7, GT7T, and GT 7 Dream Edition. The Realme GT 7 features a 7,000mAh battery, 120W Ultra Charge, Sony IMX906-powered AI camera, and AI integration features, and its price starts from RM1,999.

articles.title: Walmart is blowing out Dyson vacuums as low as $199 during this flash sale
articles.author: Stan Horaczek
articles.summary: Dyson's vacuum products are currently being offered at discounted prices at Walmart. Select models, including the Dyson Big Ball Turbinehead Canister Vacuum, are available for as low as $199.

articles.title: Need a Father's Day gift? Aldi has it all from £1.75 lager to Givenchy dupe
articles.author: Molly Court
articles.summary: Aldi is launching new products as part of its Father's Day gift guide for 2025, which includes items like the Golf Pong Set, Drew & Cole Sandwich Maker, Lacura Island Oasis Eau de Parfum, Glen Marnoch Speyside Single Malt Scotch Whisky, and a Beer Dispenser. Other products include Cast Iron Dutch Oven, Dartboard, Grande Spanish Lager, Lacura Ambition Eau De Parfum, and Shower Speaker.

articles.title: Google Lens Is Heading to YouTube Shorts Beta to Help Users Find More Information by Scanning Videos
articles.author: Isaiah Richard
articles.summary: Google is introducing Google Lens integration within YouTube Shorts. This new feature allows users to find items seen in Shorts, such as clothes, technology, and restaurants, directly within the YouTube app using Google Lens' visual search capabilities.

articles.title: Father's Day 2025: Gift ideas based on your dad's personality
articles.author: Hermes Joy Tunac
articles.summary: The article highlights several gift ideas for Father's Day, including the Oneida Vanguard 13-Piece Cutlery Set and Ninja Blast Portable Blender for cooking enthusiasts. Music-loving dads might appreciate the Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II Bluetooth Speaker, while those focused on dental hygiene could benefit from the Waterpik Cordless Select WF-10K and Waterpik Express Cordless Water Flosser WF-02. Also mentioned are Guess Uomo Intenso, Givenchy Gentleman Society Ambree Eau de Parfum, Noerden LIZ+ Smart Bottle and TUMI's 50th limited-edition collection.

articles.title: Here Is How Technology Is Revolutionizing Kenya's Laundromat Market
articles.author: Soko Directory Team
articles.summary: LG and Hotpoint are collaborating to support the expansion of commercial laundry marts, which incorporate high-tech laundry machines. LG's machines feature smart technologies, enabling users to monitor laundry progress via a mobile app and providing operators with real-time machine insights for proactive maintenance.

articles.title: 35 Products To Help With Bodily Things You Google About
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Burt's Bees introduced a sunburn soother made with aloe and coconut oil. Biofreeze launched a Dry Stick for portable pain relief. Olay released a Super Serum Body Wash with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides.

articles.title: 'Beautifully feminine' dress by New Look called 'incredibly flattering'
articles.author: Nicole Haynes
articles.summary: New Look is offering the Off White Floral Print Puff Sleeve Midi Dress, priced at £45.99. This dress features a slender bodice, square neckline, puffed sleeves, and a side leg slit, making it suitable for various occasions. Customer reviews describe the dress as 'timeless' and 'feminine,' although some mention sizing issues.

articles.title: 'Beautifully feminine' dress by New Look described as 'incredibly flattering' by shoppers
articles.author: Nicole Haynes
articles.summary: New Look is promoting its 'Off White Floral Print Puff Sleeve Midi Dress,' priced at £45.99. This dress features a slender bodice, square neckline, puffed sleeves, and a side leg slit, making it suitable for various occasions. Customer reviews describe it as 'timeless' and 'feminine,' with some suggesting sizing adjustments.

articles.title: Zoca: $6 Million Raised For Transforming Local Businesses With Agentic AI
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: Zoca launched an AI-based growth platform that optimizes discovery, converts leads into bookings, and manages marketing for hyperlocal service businesses. The platform includes AI agents for paid ads and social media management, aiming to provide a comprehensive marketing solution.

articles.title: Reviewers Over 50 Love These 30 Products
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: The content introduces various new products, including a teeth-whitening pen, a tightening cream, compression gloves and socks, a shower spray, yoga blocks, hair oil (Verb), a standing weeder, breast pillow, facial hair trimmer (Schick dermaplaning razors), nail concealer, grape cutter, veggie chopper, moisturizing hair treatment, K18 leave-in reparative treatment, open-toed sandals, kegel weights, a flossing toothbrush, Levi's pull-on skinny jeans, callus-removing gel, Embryolisse moisturizing cream, anti-humidity spray, gnat trap, washing machine cleaning tablets, eye cream, earplugs, mattress lifter, cooling pillows, and a Trtl travel pillow. These products span personal care, fashion, and home improvement, offering solutions for various needs.

articles.title: How to use Google Stitch to design apps even if you have zero coding skills
articles.author: Jaspreet Bindra
articles.summary: Google has launched Stitch, a new tool powered by Gemini, that transforms text prompts or sketches into polished UI designs and production-ready code. Stitch integrates with Figma and Google's Imagen, and is currently in public beta offering free monthly generation quotas.

articles.title: $500,000 in 48 Hours: The Handy 2 Shatters Kickstarter Expectations - Ohdoki
articles.author: Victoria Advocate
articles.summary: Ohdoki launched The Handy 2 and The Handy 2 Pro. The new products have raised $500,000 within 48 hours after being launched on Kickstarter.

articles.title: Slim, sleek, but slightly too short-lived: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge review, Digital News
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, their slimmest and lightest phone yet, featuring Google Gemini AI integration. The Edge has dual cameras, a 3,900 mAh battery, and is priced at $1,628, positioning it as a premium but potentially less value-driven option compared to other S25 flagships.

articles.title: Homeless entrepreneur Sean builds babywear business inspired by daughter's eczema condition
articles.author: Martin Claffey
articles.summary: Goosey Goo, founded by Sean Fox and Clodagh Kelly, launched a line of organic hypoallergenic clothing for infants. The company's website is live, selling babygrows for €15, and they have achieved almost €2,000 in sales since April. Goosey Goo is planning to expand into markets in Dublin and Cork.

articles.title: Should the maker of Ozempic be funding children's playgrounds in Ireland?
articles.author: The Irish Times
articles.summary: Novo Nordisk Ireland launched the 'Play at Primary School Initiative'. This initiative provides new playground equipment to primary schools.

articles.title: Mira Rajput's organisation is selling stress management sessions for Rs 1.75 lakh, social media reacts: ‘Healed just by looking at the price tag'
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: Mira Rajput is launching a new business venture.

articles.title: vivo Y29 launches with 6500mAh BlueVolt battery at Php 8,999
articles.author: The Philadelphia Inquirer
articles.summary: vivo launched the vivo Y29 smartphone, making it available at a starting price of Php 8,999.

articles.title: New Lidl in Belfast 'would bring 100 jobs in £12m investment'
articles.author: Belfast Telegraph
articles.summary: Lidl Northern Ireland is introducing "smart" shopping carts in all 41 of its stores. These carts will allow customers to scan items and pay directly, bypassing traditional checkout lines, based on a successful two-year pilot program.

articles.title: Amazon Slashes Price On Its Kindle Colorsoft Just In Time For Father's Day
articles.author: David Phelan
articles.summary: Amazon's Kindle Colorsoft, the first color Kindle, is now on sale with a 19% discount, reducing the price from £269.99 to £219.99 at the U.K. Amazon site. The Colorsoft features a color display, 32GB storage, auto-adjusting front light sensors, and wireless charging, and is waterproof. It offers faster page turns and a seven-inch screen similar to the Kindle Paperwhite Signature Edition, with the added benefit of color for cookery books, travel guides, and graphic novels.

articles.title: Every Nintendo Switch 2 Exclusive (So Far)
articles.author: Gamespot
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Switch 2 console with a new strategy for game releases. Unlike previous launches, the Switch 2 will launch with only a single first-party exclusive title. This approach represents a change in Nintendo's release cadence for new games on the new console.

articles.title: The Biggest Game Releases Of June 2025
articles.author: Gamespot
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Switch 2 console. The Switch 2 launch marks a new chapter for the company.

articles.title: I replaced my iPhone with a premium dumbphone - here's my verdict after a month
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Light Phone 3 features an AMOLED display and minimal OS, offering a premium experience with minimal features. This product targets consumers seeking a simplified mobile experience.
